controller

Class UseItemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Handler
      • controller.UseItemHandler

  • public class UseItemHandler
extends Handler
    Handler/Controller for the use case in which an item is used
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere and Stefan Pante

      • UseItemHandler

        public UseItemHandler(Game game,
              java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Constructs a new UseItemHandler with the given game and given listener.
        Parameters:
        game - The game which this UseItemHandler will use.
        listener - The PropertyChangelistener for this UseItemHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • useItem

        public void useItem(Item item)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Uses the given item for the player. Exceptions are handled when the player uses an item that isn't in his inventory. (IllegalArgument) Or when the player cannot use the item on the square.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
